艌字的基本解释

艌
niàn
用桐油和石灰填补船缝：“中流舟漏……舟得近岸，艌之而行。”

艌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niàn］
［《字彙》奴店切］
用麻絮油灰嵌塞船缝。

艌字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【舟字部】　艌； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1011第22
【篇海】奴店切，音念。艌船。【正字通】或曰挽舟索謂之?。本作牽。或作縴。因其爲挽舟具，故从念从舟作艌。艌音牽去聲。今葺理舊船讀若念者，有音無義，方俗語也。

艌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
艌字的起名意思

暂无。

Long
Basic explanation of words
Long
niàn
Fill the seam of the boat with tung oil and lime: "The boat leaks in the middle of the river... the boat gets near the shore and travels farther away."
Long
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niàn］
["Words" slave shop cut]
Use hemp and putty to caulk the seams of the boat.
Long
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Zhou Zi Department] 　艌; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1011 22
[Pianhai] Slave shop cuts, Yinnian. Long boat. [Zhengzitong] Or it is said that the boat can be so called. This is a lead. Or as a fiber. Because it is a tool for holding a boat, it is used as a boat from the mind. Huyin pulls away the sound. Those who read the old boats in today's old boats are like people who have sound but not meaning, as well as the colloquial proverbs.
Long
